articles.title: Archie Battersbee: Parents to take case to European Court of Human Rights - BBC
articles.description: The 12-year-old's life support was due to be withdrawn on Wednesday morning.
articles.content:
Archie Battersbee's parents have submitted an application to the European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) in a bid to postpone the withdrawal of his life support.

articles.title: Webb captures stellar gymnastics in the Cartwheel Galaxy - European Space Agency
